bookinfo.title: Red Hat DocBook XML Usage Guide
bookinfo.subtitle: Recommended practices for using DocBook XML tags in Red Hat documentation.

abstract.para: This book describes the recommended DocBook XML tags to use in Red Hat documentation. It is a work in progress, and especially in the early stages of development covers questions that have been raised about the correct or preferred tags to use. It is currently far from complete or definitive, and needs considerable help.
